item.title: How to apply overlays to images
item.description: An overlay seems like it would be something difficult to achieve however, it is actually relatively simple and it can be done with just CSS. For this example, let’s assume that you wish to overlay text on an image when you hover over it. To do this let’s first take a look at some HTML. <section> <div class="photo" <div class="overlay"> <h2> some text </h2> </div> <img src="my-image.jpg"> </div> </section>

item.title: How to achieve grid layouts using Flexbox
item.description: Flexbox is a very powerful tool and it is one that can be used to create layouts as well as responsive navigation bars. Let’s say that you wish to lay out a selection of images on a page in a grid style. By default, the browser will stack your images vertically down the page. However, we can easily achieve this effect using Flexbox. Firstly, ensure that all the images you wish to be formatted this way are grouped together in a <section>.

item.title: How to use media queries to make responsive text
item.description: Websites need to look good across a multitude of screens and therfore it is essential that a site is responsive so that a user’s experience is not affected by their choice of screen size. I encountered a problem whilst building this site that was causing some of my headers to be cut off of the page when the browser size was reduced. I had previously tried using margins and padding to try and fix this issue however, some research led me to media queries.

item.title: Why I came out of univeristy to focus on coding
item.description: The best decison I could have made One of the most common questions children are asked is ‘What do you want to be when you are older?’. In my opinion this is quite a difficult question to answer. Not many people have a firm idea of what they really want to do. There are of course those who know exactly which career direction they wish to pursue, medicine for example. However, for most of us, finding that one thing that is going to spark your interest and kickstart your career is quite hard to discover.
